other: As long as she isn't staggered or otherwise disabled, she uses a free unopposed S1 on the main target of {identity:10113} whenever he uses his S3 regardless of whether she has {status:ContemptPersonality}. This version deals 50% damage and can't kill the target.

Both versions of S3 trigger {status:Switch_Vibration} into {status:VibrationBleeding} causing any {status:VibrationExplosion} to deal bonus {keyword:Lust} damage based on the average of their {status:Vibration} and {status:Laceration} Potencies.
{status:GazeRyoshu} increases damage dealt to and received from {sinner:4} by 10% per stack (70% at max stacks).
{status:ContemptRyoshu} reduces damage dealt to and received from {sinner:4} by 50%.
{status:GazePersonality} increases any damage she deals by 7% per stack (49% at max stacks) and increases her {status:GazeRyoshu} on hit by +1.

{status:ContemptPersonality} gives her 7 {status:Protection} and {status:AttackDmgDown} and 20 {status:Aggro} for a turn, making her very weak but tanky during that turn. She also reflects a bit of damage taken as {keyword:Sloth} damage.
usage: Using her skills will passively inflict {status:GazeRyoshu} on enemies, which increases damage both to and from {sinner:4}. At 7 stacks, it gets converted to {status:ContemptRyoshu}, which reduces damage instead. Then it flips between the two statuses every turn. Both statuses are automatically transferred to other enemies on death unless consumed by {sinner:4}.

Her S3 gets upgraded once enemies have a total of 7+ {status:GazeRyoshu} or at least one {status:ContemptRyoshu}. It gets 3 Atk Weight and consumes the statuses to deal much higher damage. Sub-targets will receive 50% damage and the main target will receive 200% damage if it's the only target.

She gains {status:GazePersonality} when her S3-2 consumes the debuffs: 1 stack for every 2 {status:GazeRyoshu} and 3 stacks for every {status:ContemptRyoshu}. If you want to trigger her combo with {identity:10113}, you'll need her to gain 7 stacks. She's limited to only generating 6 stacks per turn this way, so you'll need to use {ego:20407} to cover the missing stacks.

{status:GazePersonality} increases her damage for a turn. If she has 7, it converts to {status:ContemptPersonality} the following turn. This drastically reduces her damage dealt and taken for that turn, but if {identity:10113} uses his S3, he gets a free cast of {sinner:4}'s S4, which is a similar skill to his S3, but targeting {sinner:4} instead.
She can also force herself to gain {status:ContemptPersonality} by using her defense skill if the enemies have enough of the statuses. She also gets it the first time she's staggered.

1041201.desc:
On Hit against enemies, inflict 1 [GazeRyoshu] (once per turn per enemy)
- If this unit has [GazePersonality], inflict +1 more [GazeRyoshu]

When hit by an enemy, inflict 1 [GazeRyoshu] against the attacker (once per Skill; 3 times per turn)
- If this unit has [ContemptPersonality]: when hit by the attacker's final Coin, inflict (10% of the damage dealt by that final Coin) Sloth damage (max 10 per Skill; max 30 per turn)

If this unit used its Base Attack Skills to consume [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] on an enemy:
Next turn, gain ((enemy's [GazeRyoshu] consumed/2) + (enemy's [ContemptRyoshu] consumed x 3)) [GazePersonality] (6 per turn; rounded down)
1041201.name: @#$'s Hand I Let Slip

1041202.desc:
When Staggered, gain 4 [Protection] and gain [ContemptPersonality] next turn (once per Encounter)

On death, apply the following effects against 3 enemies with the most [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] (in descending order; in Focused Encounters, Parts)
- Inflict 2 [Binding] next turn
- Inflict 2 [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count
- Inflict 2 [Vibration] and +1 [Vibration] Count
1041202.name: Grasp that Forbids Falling

1041203.desc:
Combat Start: N Corp. E.G.O::Fell Bullet Yi Sang's 'Target Readjustment Fire' Skill gains the following effects:
- Before using the Skill, if N Corp. E.G.O::Contempt, Awe Ryōshū has [ContemptPersonality] and can use her base Skills, use "I Shall Fire / Anytime" against Ryōshū (once per turn; 'I Shall Fire / Anytime' reflects Yi Sang's Uptie Tier)
- Before using the Skill, if the Skill's main target isn't N Corp. E.G.O::Contempt, Awe Ryōshū, and if she can use her base Skills, Ryōshū uses her Skill 1 as an Unopposed Attack against the main target (once per turn; [CantIdentify]; Skill 1 deals -50% damage; the Skill does not kill the main target)
1041203.name: Let me show everyone something very interesting

1041211.desc:
On Hit against enemies, inflict 2 [GazeRyoshu] (once per turn per enemy)
- If this unit has [GazePersonality], inflict +1 more [GazeRyoshu]

When hit by an enemy, inflict 1 [GazeRyoshu] against the attacker (once per Skill; 3 times per turn)
- If this unit has [ContemptPersonality]: when hit by the attacker's final Coin, inflict (20% of the damage dealt by that final Coin) Sloth damage (max 20 per Skill; max 60 per turn)

If this unit used its Base Attack Skills to consume [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] on an enemy:
Next turn, gain ((enemy's [GazeRyoshu] consumed/2) + (enemy's [ContemptRyoshu] consumed x 3)) [GazePersonality] (6 per turn; rounded down)
1041211.name: @#$'s Hand I Let Slip

1041221.desc:
If the ally with the earliest Deployment order hits an enemy with its attack, inflict 1 [Laceration] (once per enemy per turn)
- If target has [Laceration], inflict +1 [Laceration] Count as well

If the ally with the earliest Deployment order is hit by an enemy, inflict 1 [Vibration] against the attacker (3 times per turn)
- If the attacker has [Vibration], inflict +1 [Vibration] Count as well
1041221.name: It flows and cries

External effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
Prioritizes targeting enemies with [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] as sub-targets
- Deals -50% damage against sub-targets
If there is just a single target, deal +200% damage (for Focused Encounters, a Part)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 ([Laceration] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +2% damage for every ([Laceration] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 50%)
[WhenUse] Deal +7% damage for every 1 (sum of [GazeRyoshu] on all attack targets) (max 49%)
[EndSkill] Consumes [GazeRyoshu] or [ContemptRyoshu] on all targets that were hit
data.name: Cascading Gaze of Awe Underneath Contempt
